name: Beta Ray Bill Trivia Game | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What alien race does Bill hail from?
questions.explanation:
The Korbinites.

	Beta Ray Bill was genetically engineered to protect the Korbinites as they searched for a new home world. With his help, they settled on a new planet.

questions.text: What is the name of Bill's hammer?
questions.explanation:
Stormbreaker.

	Odin crafted this war hammer for Bill, giving it the same enchantments as Mjolnir. Because of this, Stormbreaker can only be used by Bill.

questions.text: Where did Thor and Bill fight for the right to wield Mjolnir?
questions.explanation:
Skartheim.

	A fiery realm, Skartheim favored Bill's alien physiology. Bill won the fight by a hair, but refused to take the prize.

questions.text: In which year did Beta Ray Bill first appear?
questions.explanation:
1983.

	He appeared in "The Mighty Thor", number 337. Bill was created by Walt Simonson as a rival to Thor.

questions.text: Bill was one member of the three-member team the Starmasters. Who was also a member of the group?
questions.explanation:
Quasar.

	Quasar, Silver Surfer and Beta Ray Bill were the Starmasters, formed to investigate and avert a meteorite headed for Earth with a black hole at its center. After the adventure, they stayed together.

questions.text: Bill arrived to fight with the Asgardians during Ragnarok. Whom did Bill kill within seconds of arriving?
questions.explanation:
Fenris.

	Fenris is the wolf-like son of Loki, whom Bill reduced to a skeleton as payment for Fenris threatening a weak Thor.

questions.text: After Ragnarok, Bill came face-to-face with Ashta. By which other name is Ashta known?
questions.explanation:
Galactus.

	Galactus needs to devour worlds in order to survive, and is an integral part of the Marvel Universe. He has fought with the Silver Surfer and the Fantastic Four.

questions.text: When in his human form, what is Bill's name?
questions.explanation:
Simon Walters.

	Possibly a nod to his creator, Bill finds himself in the body of a recently-deceased war veteran named Simon Walters. By slamming his cane onto the ground, he can become Beta Ray Bill once more.

questions.text: Bill is helped in his adventures by his sentient ship. What is it called?
questions.explanation:
Skuttlebutt.

	Skuttlebutt has come to Bill's aid many times when he is tired or in need of rescue. Bill has had this ship since he was first created, and it was damaged when Bill first met Thor.

questions.text: Which Asgardian did Bill become close with?
questions.explanation:
Sif.

	Sif and Bill have had a particularly close relationship, as both are warriors. This relationship has not been stated to be romantic; Sif is promised to Thor!
